elements.title: Sustainable office retrofit begins at new CISL headquarters
elements.description: The University of [Cambridge Institute for Sustainability Leadership](https://www.cisl.cam.ac.uk/) (CISL) has announced the start of works on its new visionary headquarters. The Entopia Building, a retrofitted 1930s Telephone Exchange at 1 Regent Street, Cambridge, will be transformed in 2021 into an ultra-low carbon sustainability hub

elements.title: London Mayor Sadiq Khan declares 'retrofit revolution' to slash building emissions
elements.description: A new £3.5m 'centre of excellence' with funding from BEIS to help social housing providers retrofit their homes, and City Hall has also entered a new partnership deal that could unlock £10bn of private finance to cut building emissions.
